prompt:
Produce a single OpenCL C kernel for operation matmul.
Name the kernel generated_matmul. Use this exact signature:
__kernel void generated_matmul(const int M, const int N, const int K,
                                  __global const float* A,
                                  __global const float* B,
                                  __global float* C);
Implement C = A (MxK) x B (KxN).
- Use simple global indexing; no extensions; no includes; compile on OpenCL 2.0.
- Bounds check all reads/writes; do not assume multiples of workgroup sizes.
Output only the code block.
